title: ADIFF 2015 - Shelter
desc: Tahir (Anthony Mackie), a Nigerian Muslim with an expired visa, and Hannah (Jennifer Connelly), a suicidal heroin junkie fall in love while homeless on the streets of New York. They have different beliefs owing to different backgrounds, but they find dependence and strength in each other. Through their love story, Shelter explores the bleak reality of living homeless.?Directed by Paul Bettany, USA, 2014, 105min, drama in English.
